120,00 B-salary

obtained O
a O

of O
proficiency O
not O
below O
than O
the O
NVQ B-qualifications
level I-qualifications

for O

INDUSTRIES I-company

are O
a O
long O
established O

MANAGEMENT B-job_title
TRAINEE I-job_title
Responsibilities O
• O
To O
assist O
the O
Tea O
/commercial O
/Exports O
/Purchasing O
/Operations O
& O
other O
departments O
in O
daily O
operations O

Strong O
interpersonal B-res_skill

and O

of O

Kirindiwita I-adrs
. O

Its O
flagship O
brand O
"Arpico" O
is O
one O
of O
the O

powerful O

in O

over O

V O
Assess B-res_skill
Service O
Levels O
and O
Performance O
Indicators O
with O
the O
client O
representative O
define O
mechanism O
to O

performance O
levels O
of O
various O
subcontractors O
. O

Report O
of O
the O
Special O
Council O
Meeting O
recommending O
three O
names O
candidates O
will O
be O
forwarded O
to O
University O
Grants O
Commission, O
for O
consideration O
appointment, O
as O
per O
accepted O
procedure O
prescribed O
in O
UGC O

No O
. O
02 O

dated O
May O
04, O

or O

should O
addressed O
Registrar O
/Secretary O

Uva O
Wellassa O
University, O
Passara O
Road, O
Badulla B-location
